summary:
**Grand Theft Auto III** is a popular video game from 2001. You play as Claude, who seeks revenge after his girlfriend betrays him. The game takes place in a made-up city called Liberty City, inspired by New York. You can explore the city freely, either on foot or by vehicle. It was the first game in the series to have a fully 3D world.

The game was very successful and won many awards, but it also caused controversy because of its violent and adult content. It led to several spin-offs and is seen as one of the best games ever made.
title: Grand Theft Auto III
